imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

kubeVersion.description: Force target Kubernetes version (using Helm capabilities if not set)

nameOverride.description: String to partially override suitecrm.fullname template (will maintain the release name)

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override suitecrm.fullname template

extraDeploy.description: Array with extra yaml to deploy with the chart. Evaluated as a template

commonAnnotations.description: Common annotations to add to all SuiteCRM resources (sub-charts are not considered). Evaluated as a template

commonLabels.description: Common labels to add to all SuiteCRM resources (sub-charts are not considered). Evaluated as a template

tag.description: SuiteCRM image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: SuiteCRM image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

debug.description: Specify if debug logs should be enabled

replicaCount.description: Number of replicas (requires ReadWriteMany PVC support)

suitecrmSkipInstall.description: Skip SuiteCRM installation wizard. Useful for migrations and restoring from SQL dump

suitecrmValidateUserIP.description: Whether to validate the user IP address or not

suitecrmHost.description: SuiteCRM host to create application URLs

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

type.description: Update strategy - only really applicable for deployments with RWO PVs attached

extraEnvVars.description: An array to add extra environment variables

extraVolumes.description: Extra volumes to add to the deployment. Requires setting `extraVolumeMounts`

extraVolumeMounts.description: Extra volume mounts to add to the container. Requires setting `extraVolumeMounts

initContainers.description: Extra init containers to add to the deployment

sidecars.description: Extra sidecar containers to add to the deployment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for pod assignment. Evaluated as a template.

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default)

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment

existingSecret.description: Name of a secret with the application password

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match Ignored if `affinity` is set.

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `affinity` is set.

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for pod assignment. Evaluated as a template.

requests.description: The requested resources for the container

lifecycleHooks.description: lifecycleHooks for the container to automate configuration before or after startup

enabled.description: Whether to deploy a mariadb server to satisfy the applications database requirements

storageClass.description: MariaDB data Persistent Volume Storage Class

hostPath.description: Set path in case you want to use local host path volumes (not recommended in production)

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing `PersistentVolumeClaim` for MariaDB primary replicas

user.description: Existing username in the external database

existingSecret.description: Name of an existing secret resource containing the DB password

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for SuiteCRM volume

accessModes.description: PVC Access Mode for SuiteCRM volume

size.description: PVC Storage Request for SuiteCRM volume

existingClaim.description: An Existing PVC name for SuiteCRM volume

hostPath.description: Host mount path for SuiteCRM volume

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes volume permissions in the data directory (for cases where the default k8s `runAsUser` and `fsUser` values do not work)

digest.description: Init container volume-permissions image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullPolicy.description: Init container volume-permissions image pull policy

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

limits.description: The resources limits for the container

requests.description: The requested resources for the container

clusterIP.description: Static clusterIP or None for headless services

loadBalancerIP.description: loadBalancerIP for the SuiteCRM Service (optional, cloud specific)

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose (normally used with the `sidecar` value)

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for SuiteCRM service

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress resource

path.description: Default path for the ingress record

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.hostname` parameter

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

secrets.description: If you're providing your own certificates, please use this to add the certificates as secrets

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

tag.description: Apache exporter image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Apache exporter image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullSecrets.description: Specify docker-registry secret names as an array

resources.description: Metrics exporter resource requests and limits

type.description: Kubernetes service type for Prometheus metrics

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

certificateSecret.description: Secret containing the certificate and key to add

name.description: Name of the secret containing the certificate chain

key.description: Key of the certificate chain file inside the secret

certificateLocation.description: Location in the container to store the certificate

keyLocation.description: Location in the container to store the private key

chainLocation.description: Location in the container to store the certificate chain

customCAs.description: Defines a list of secrets to import into the container trust store

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Secret containing extra environment variables (in case of sensitive data)

tag.description: Container sidecar image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Container sidecar image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

namespaceSelector.description: Monitoring namespace selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the prometheus' namespace.

podSelector.description: Monitoring pod selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the Prometheus pods.

enabled.description: Enable network policy for Ingress Proxies

namespaceSelector.description: Ingress Proxy namespace selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the Ingress Proxy's namespace.

podSelector.description: Ingress Proxy pods selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the Ingress Proxy pods.

backendOnlyAccessibleByFrontend.description: Enable ingress rule that makes the backend (mariadb) only accessible by SuiteCRM's pods.

customBackendSelector.description: Backend selector labels. These labels will be used to identify the backend pods.

enabled.description: Enable ingress rule that makes SuiteCRM only accessible from a particular origin

namespaceSelector.description: Namespace selector label that is allowed to access SuiteCRM. This label will be used to identified the allowed namespace(s).

podSelector.description: Pods selector label that is allowed to access SuiteCRM. This label will be used to identified the allowed pod(s).

denyConnectionsToExternal.description: Enable egress rule that denies outgoing traffic outside the cluster, except for DNS (port 53).
